page.title: 12A MORNING IN THE LIFE OF....
page.content: I AROSE AT 7.35AM MY MUM CAME IN AND BROUGHT OUT MY CLOTHES. IN THE BATHROOM I GOT WASHED. I HAD A PLATE OF CORNFLAKES AND A CUP OF COFFEE FOR MY BREAKFAST. IT WAS JUST AFTER 8.30AM WHEN I LEFT TO GO TO SCHOOL.I MET LORNA AT SCHOOL AND WE STOOD ABOUT TILL THE BELL RANG AT 9.00 A.M. IN CLASS WE DID SOME LANGUAGE WORK,AT 9.30AM WE WENT TO THE BATHS AND CAME BACK AT 11.10 AM AND WENT OUT TO PLAY FOR 5 MINS SINCE WE HAD MISSED OUR PLAYTIME. WE CAME BACK IN AND DID SOME MORE WORK UP UNTIL 12.15PM WHEN THE BELL RANG.
